Job Description:
1) Survey and update the following market information in monthly basis:
- 4 P analysis (Product, Price, Place and Promotion)
- Current market and competitors information
- SWOT analysis (Strength, Weakness, Opportunity, Threat)
- Market size and share

    advertising, etc) and monitor in every month
3) Take care the marketing materials (e.g. catalogue, packaging, POP, etc) related to brands
4) Monitor and update sales forecast by volume, SKU and color shade in quarterly basis
5) Coordinate with Sales Admin to arrange sales tools to support Sales Dept.
6) Other duties may be assigned as required
Job Requirement:
1) Minimum 3-5 years in product marketing management from related business, preferably from decorative paint business.

2) Must have demonstrated good analytical, organizational, and teamwork skills, as well as communication skills.

3) High creativity and energetic 

4) Good command of English is required

5) Computer literacy (MS word, excel, powerpoint, E-mail)

6) Prefer Jakarta resident

7) Have experience in starting a new business/ entry new market
Company Profile:
TOA Paint (Thailand) Co., Ltd is the largest decorative paint manufacturer in South East Asia and exporter of premium paint products including decorative paint, heavy paint, wood coating, protective coating, marine coating, chemical construction, aerosol spray and abrasive product. TOA is the leader of innovative and decorative paint manufacturer in South East Asia who offers and supplies a variety of demand by a plenty innovative painting solution system in both household and industrial market. More than 50 years of paint business, our products continue to gain an increasing share of the highly competitive in both international market and domestic sales due to our premium product quality and high service level. 

With high standard and strong product portfolio, TOA has been growing faster than the industry average. We draw our strengths from the new products, best-managed behavior, and also strong sales force. During the past ten year, TOA has expanded its business to Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Malaysia and Indonesia. 

TOA considers the importance of the human capital and equality of opportunity. Our employees will be offered an attractive salary and benefits package as well as career and learning development. 

Due to our rapid growth and expansion in the business, we are currently looking for the number of dynamic, result-oriented, and high energetic calibers to join our excellent team in the following positions:
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   +662 335-5555 31/2 Moo3. Bangna-Trad Rd., KM. 23, Bangsaothong, Amphur Bangsaothong, Samuthprakarn, 10540, THailand  Head Office  +662 335-5555

Job Description:
1) Responsible for selling to projects, including all site coordination.

2) Expand TOA products line to customers and achieve sales target in the assigned area.

3) Develop prospective customers relations through appropriate sales methods to optimize quality of service, business growth, and customer and satisfaction. 

4) Plan and manage personal business portfolio / territory / business according to an agreed market development strategy

5) Monitor and report on market and competitor activities and provide relevant reports and information. 

6) Execute sales tools with Marketing team to expand company's product line and increase sales volume.

7) Record, analyze and conduct sales daily, weekly, monthly and yearly reports.

8) Other duties may be assigned as required.
Job Requirement:
1) Minimum 3-5 years of selling function in dealing with project sales with preferably from decorative paint business.

2) Result-oriented with high integrity in Sales Profession.

3) Pleasant personality and excellent communication.

4) Good command of English is required.

5) Computer literacy (MS word, excel, powerpoint, E-mail).

6) Hard working, good negotiation and coordination skill.

7) Prefer Jakarta resident.

8) Owning vehicle is a plus.

1) Develop Company Strategy Planning to lead the sales&marketing and service quality of the company to meet sales objectives, customer satisfaction, and increase market share as company's targets.

 2) Set up or build the networking of customer relationships, sustain good relationship with existing clients, and identify potential business opportunities in the middle and long term relationship plan.

 3) Monitor, record, analyse and report on activities, trends, results and recommendations relating to company activities, reporting to Management. 

 4) Manage company's P&L and overall company budget in accordance with company policy & procedures to optimize cost-effectiveness as the whole.

 5) Development, Oversea, and implement company policies, systems, and procedures in accordance with TOA group's guideline and practices.

 6) Lead and coach staffs in all department/division reporting to the position so as to effectively recruit, train, evaluate, motivate, delegate and monitor their activities

Job Requirement:

 2) Experience in starting a new business/ entry new market.

 3) Must have demonstrated strong analytical / planning&monitoring/problem solving and organizational as well as excellent verbal/written communication skills.

 4) Strong Leadership and ability to manage, inspire and lead a team.
